00019     tp.input[0] = -100;
00020 
00021     {
00022         vector<unsigned> layers;
00023         layers.push_back(1);
00024         for(unsigned i = 0; i < layers_count; ++i)
00025             layers.push_back(25);

00027

00030 
00031         cout<<"MLP ready\n";
00032 
00033         //Test run()
00034         {
00035             progress_timer t;
00036             for(unsigned i = 0; i < runs_count; i++)

00038                 cout<<i+1<<"-th run: "; 
00039                 cout.flush();
00040                 {
00041                     progress_timer t;
00042                     net->setInput(tp.input);
00043                     net->run(FeedforwardPropagationRunner::Instance());
00044                 }
00045             }
00046             cout<<"Total: ";
00047         }
00048         //Output
00049         valarray<Float> output;
00050         net->getOutput(output);
00051         //cout<<"Test output: "<<setprecision(5)<<fixed<<output[0]<<endl;
00052     
00053         //Serialization test
00054         Storage::save(*net, "test_net.xml");
00055 
00056         //Memory consumption test
00057         cout<<"It's time to do memory test\n";
00058 //        sleep(5);
00059     }
00060 
00061     Net net2;
00062     cout<<"New net...OK\n";
00063     Storage::load(net2, "test_net.xml");
00064     cout<<"Loading done\n";
00065 
00066     //Test run()
00067     {
